cont.entity_a: Defective unit received, with a bent pot and a lid that cannot sit level, leading to sealing failures. Missing parts included a $30 weight and instruction manual, rendering the unit unusable.
cont.entity_b: Some issues with size perception and missing parts upon delivery.

cont.entity_a: Customer service required sending the unit back for repair instead of replacement. Comes with a thorough instruction manual and supportive customer service.
Heavy-duty, durable, and reliable for extensive canning.
cont.entity_b: Durable construction. High-quality stainless steel construction.

cont.entity_a: No gaskets to replace, using a metal-to-metal seal.
cont.entity_b: Easy to use with several good features, including safety measures. Swiss-made, reflecting quality and engineering precision.

cont.entity_a: Efficiently processes a large number of jars, saving time.
Suitable for use on gas stoves; caution advised for glass top stoves due to weight. Heavy when loaded, which may be difficult for some users to handle.
cont.entity_b: Quiet operation with easy temperature control. Suitable for various meals, including soups and roasts. Easy to clean and maintain. Comes in multiple sizes for different cooking needs.

cont.entity_a: Requires proper lubrication to ensure a good seal.
cont.entity_b: Requires manual steam release, lacking an automatic feature. Issues with plastic components breaking after limited use.
